text: Manfred Schmid (born 20 February 1971) is an Austrian football coach and a former midfielder. He is the manager of Austria Wien.Kurier.at:Entscheidung gefallen: Manfred Schmid wird Austria-Trainer (German) ==Playing career== Schmid played for Austria Wien from 1989 to 2002 and LASK Linz from 2002 to 2003. ==Managing career== He often was assistence coach under Peter St√∂ger. Since the 2021-22 season he is head coach of FK Austria Wien.Transfermarkt.at:Manfred Schmid profile (German) Category:1971 births Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austrian football managers Category:Living people Category:FK Austria Wien managers Category:LASK players ==References== Category:Austrian football midfielders
title: Manfred Schmid
